column4: hi guys, i would like some help with configuring my "Microsoft Wireless Laser Mouse 5000" with ubuntu 10.10 x86_64.
i have two issues: 1. middle button copy/paste does not work in terminal. 2. the scroll button and the side buttons don't work.
my xorg.conf settings are the default: Section "InputDevice"
FloodBot2 is right. Paste it to another site like pastebin.com and then paste the link in here
sorry about that. i don't use irc that often and there were only 5 or 6 lines.
since, well at least 10.04 and maybe even 9.10, ubuntu doesn't create one when you log install it
I forgot your original question but try taking a look at the progeam nvidia-settings
but that does only monitor settings and i am good. I want to change my mouse settings.
ah yeah right. Now I remember
I mean I remember your question. Don't remember the mouse specifics but try reading: man xorg.conf
is there some howtos about the mouse settings?
i use a dual screen with ati at work but it is on CentOS with the default ATI catalyst driver.
